TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollableControl extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable
Public Class ScrollableControl Inherits Control Implements IDisposable
public ref class ScrollableControl : System::Windows::Forms::Control, IDisposable

summary.span: 为支持自动滚动行为的控件定义一个基类。

span.span: Defines a base class for controls that support auto-scrolling behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你通常不使用类直接。You do not typically use the class directly. 和类都继承自此类。The and classes inherit from this class. 类充当需要能够滚动的控件的基类。The class acts as a base class for controls that require the ability to scroll. 若要启用一个控件来显示滚动条，根据需要设置属性`true`并设置到所需大小的属性。To enable a control to display scroll bars as needed, set the property to `true` and set the property to the desired size. 控件的尺寸小于指定的最小大小，或子控件位于控件的边界之外，将显示相应的滚动条。When the control is sized smaller than the specified minimum size, or a child control is located outside the bounds of the control, the appropriate scroll bars are displayed. 若要手动重写的滚动条是可见的设置和属性。To manually override which scroll bars are visible, set the and properties. 如果这两个属性设置为`false`，相应的滚动条不可见，即使属性设置为`true`。If either property is set to `false`, the corresponding scroll bar is not visible, even if the property is set to `true`. 你可以处理事件，以了解当用户或代码滚动工作区。You can handle the event to know when the user or code scrolls the client area. 以编程方式添加控件，向窗体，使用属性定位控件内部或外部当前的可视滚动区域。When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值构造函数将执行以下操作：The default constructor performs the following actions: - 将当前实例标记为容器控件中，通过调用方法以设置样式到`true`。Marks the current instance as a container control by calling the method to set the style to `true`. - 通过设置到`false`。Enables background erasing by setting the to `false`. - 禁用自动滚动，通过调用方法以设置位为`false`。Disables auto-scrolling by calling the method to set the bit to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void AdjustFormScrollbars(bool displayScrollbars) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub AdjustFormScrollbars (displayScrollbars As Boolean)

param.name: displayScrollbars
param.span: 如果显示滚动条，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to show the scroll bars; otherwise, .

summary.span: 根据当前控件位置和当前所选控件调整容器中的滚动条。

span.span: Adjusts the scroll bars on the container based on the current control positions and the control currently selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在需要时，方法布局客户端区域中，包括根据需要以适应滚动条，调整大小的显示区域。When required, the method lays out the client area, including resizing the display area as required to accommodate the scroll bars.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool AutoScroll { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property AutoScroll As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AutoScroll { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示容器是否允许用户滚动到任何放置在其可见边界之外的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the container enables the user to scroll to any controls placed outside of its visible boundaries.

value.span: 如果容器允许自动滚动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the container enables auto-scrolling; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`true`，此属性使要有一个虚拟大小是大于它的可视边界的容器。When `true`, this property enables the container to have a virtual size that is larger than its visible boundaries. 目前 Windows 窗受到如下限制：当 启用且 设置为 时，系统将阻止所有派生自 的类正常运行。There is currently a limitation in Windows Forms that prevents all classes derived from from acting properly when both is enabled and is set to . 例如，假设在窗体上放置了一个控件（如 ）或派生自 的一个容器类（如 或 ）。For example, let's say that you place a control such as —or a container class derived from (such as or )—on your form. 如果将容器上的 设置为 ，然后将容器内一个或多个控件的 属性设置为 ，则不会出现任何滚动条。If you set on the container to and then set the property on one or more of the controls inside of the container to , then no scrollbar ever appears. 派生自 的类的运行方式与将 设置为 时相同。The class derived from acts as if were set to . 目前，唯一的解决方法是将 嵌套到其他 内。Currently, the only workaround is to nest the inside another . 例如，如果需要在此情况下运行 ，可以将它置于 控件中并将 上的 设置为 。For instance, if you need to work in this situation, you can place it inside of a control and set on the to . > [!NOTE] > 自动维护滚动条的可见性。 maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically. 因此，设置或属性`true`没有时生效已启用。Therefore, setting the or property to `true` has no effect when is enabled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何水平和/或垂直滚动条自动提供，根据需要时属性设置为`true`。The following code example shows how horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars are provided automatically as needed when the property is set to `true`. 若要运行该示例，请按照下列步骤：To run the example, follow these steps: 1. 创建新的 Windows 窗体应用程序。Create a new Windows Forms application. 2. 在窗体上添加一个 控件。Add a to the form. 3. 添加到面板并将其命名`text1`。Add a to the panel and name it `text1`. 4. 移动文本框中，以便的右侧部分超出面板的右边缘。Move the text box so that the right part extends beyond the right edge of the panel. 你应看到仅超出数组界限面板的文本框中的部分概述。You should see only an outline of the part of the text box that is outside the bounds of the panel. 如果可见整个文本框中，文本框是窗体上，不能在面板。If the whole text box is visible, the text box is on the form and not in the panel. 5. 在窗体上添加一个 控件。Add a to the form. 6. 添加的处理程序`Click`该按钮的事件。Add a handler for the `Click` event of the button. 7. 添加下面的代码示例并从按钮的调用它`Click`处理程序。Add the following example code and call it from the button's `Click` handler. 运行示例时，你只能看到为面板的边界内的文本框的一部分。When you run the example, you can only see the part of the text box that is inside the boundaries of the panel. 单击按钮时，你将看到水平滚动条显示，使你可查看余下的文本框。When you click the button, you will see a horizontal scroll bar appear that will enable you to see the rest of the text box. 将下面的面板底部的文本框中的一部分时，你将看到垂直滚动条，单击按钮时。If you position a part of the text box below the bottom of the panel, you will see a vertical scroll bar when you click the button. 代码示例会检查文本框中是否前面板的界限之外设置属性`true`，和之前它将设置属性。The example code checks to see whether the text box is outside the bounds of the panel before it sets the property to `true`, and before it sets the property. 这超出边界检查不需要。This out-of-bounds check is not required. 如果设置为`true`，当文本框中完全面板内时，会显示任何滚动条。If is set to `true`, no scroll bars will appear when the text box is completely within the panel. 此外，你可以将其默认设置为 0，0 的边距。Also, you can leave the margins at their default settings of 0,0. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size AutoScrollMargin { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置自动滚动边距的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.

value.span: ，表示自动滚动边距的高度和宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: A that represents the height and width of the auto-scroll margin in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动滚动边距是任何子控件和可滚动父控件的边缘之间的距离。The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control. 大小添加到包含在可滚动的控件，以确定是否需要滚动条中任何子控件的大小。The size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine whether or not scroll bars are needed. 属性时调整父可滚动控件的或各个子控件放入视图中，计算和用于确定是否必须显示滚动条。The property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 停靠的控件被不确定是否必须显示滚动条的计算。Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed. > [!NOTE] > 如果某个停靠控件属性设置为、 控件填充父可滚动控件，并在使用时，将忽略停靠的控件以确定是否需要滚动条。If a docked control's property is set to , the control fills the parent scrollable control and the docked control is ignored when using the to determine whether scroll bars are needed. 如果到父可滚动控件的子控件的边缘的距离小于赋予的值属性和属性设置为`true`，显示相应的滚动条。If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the property and the property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 时，我们建议，停靠控件在可滚动的控件中，你添加的子可滚动控件，例如，用于包含任何其他可能需要滚动的控件。We recommend, when docking controls within a scrollable control, that you add a child scrollable control, such as a , to contain any other controls that might require scrolling. 应添加子到可滚动的控件的控件并将其属性设置为及其属性设置为`true`。You should add the child control to the scrollable control and its property set to and its property set to `true`. 应设置到可滚动父控件的属性`false`。You should set the property of the parent scrollable control to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 该示例计算结果的文本框中的位置，并更改的外观和行为的其父容器，panel 控件。The example evaluates the location of a text box and changes the appearance and behavior of its parent container, the panel control. 该示例需要创建的实例控件， ，和。The example requires that you have created an instance of a control, , and . 在面板上放置文本框中，以便它重叠至少一个面板的边缘。Place the text box on the panel so that it overlaps at least one of the panel's edges. 调用此函数在单击按钮可以查看的面板的行为和外观的差异。Call this function on the click of a button to see the difference in the panel's behavior and appearance. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的 或 值小于 0。

span.span: The or value assigned is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size AutoScrollMinSize { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置自动滚动的最小大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum size of the auto-scroll.

value.span: 确定用户可滚动的虚拟区域的最小大小。

span.span: A that determines the minimum size of the virtual area through which the user can scroll.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用来管理分配给自动滚动条的屏幕大小。The property is used to manage the screen size allocated to the automatic scroll bars.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Point AutoScrollPosition { System::Drawing::Point get(); void set(System::Drawing::Point value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置自动滚动定位的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the auto-scroll position.

value.span: 表示自动滚动位置的 ，单位为像素。

span.span: A that represents the auto-scroll position in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示可滚动控件的可见部分的位置。The property represents the location of the visible portion of a scrollable control. 此属性用于更改控件显示的部分。Use this property to change the portion of the control that is displayed. 以编程方式添加控件，向窗体，使用属性定位控件内部或外部当前的可视滚动区域。When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area. > [!NOTE] > 和检索到的坐标值为负，如果控件具有滚动离开它的起始位置 (0，0)。The and coordinate values retrieved are negative if the control has scrolled away from its starting position (0,0). 当设置此属性时，你必须始终分配正和值将滚动位置设置相对于起始位置。When you set this property, you must always assign positive and values to set the scroll position relative to the starting position. 例如，如果你有水平滚动条和你集 x 和 y 为 200，则会滚动 200 像素移动右侧;如果你，然后集 x 和 y 为 100，滚动似乎跳左侧转 100 个像素，因为你将其设置 100 个像素离开的起始位置。For example, if you have a horizontal scroll bar and you set x and y to 200, you move the scroll 200 pixels to the right; if you then set x and y to 100, the scroll appears to jump the left by 100 pixels, because you are setting it 100 pixels away from the starting position. 在第一种情况下，返回 {-200，0}; 在第二个用例，它将返回 {-100,0}。In the first case, returns {-200, 0}; in the second case, it returns {-100,0}. 若要检测更改，创建的事件处理程序事件，将旧的位置值保存在私有变量，并在以后的旧值的新值进行比较事件。To detect when changes, create an event handler for the event, save the old position value in a private variable, and compare the new value to the old value on subsequent events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类并将按钮添加到可滚动区域的左上角。The following code example uses the derived class and adds a button to the upper left corner of the scrollable area. 该示例允许偏移量由。The example allows for the offset determined by the . 编写示例时，假设你具有包含与在其上。The example was written under the assumption that you have a that contains a with a on it. 若要启用自动滚动，请将该按钮的工作区置于。To enable auto-scrolling, place the button outside of the client area of the . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl/CPP/scrollablecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl/CS/scrollablecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl/VB/scrollablecontrol.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`、属性是虚拟的大小和位置控件。If the property is set to `true`, the property is the virtual size and position of the control. 例如，如果的宽度和高度是这两个 100 像素和控件包含超出其边界的控件表示大小必须是以包括所包含的控件。For example, if the width and height of the are both 100 pixels and the control contains controls that extend beyond its boundaries, represents the size the needs to be to include the contained controls. 同样，和属性相关的滚动位置。Similarly, the and properties of are relevant to the scroll position of the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DockPadding As ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges

summary.span: 获取控件的所有边缘的停靠边距设置。

span.span: Gets the dock padding settings for all edges of the control.

value.span: ，表示停靠控件所有边缘的边距。

span.span: A that represents the padding for all the edges of a docked control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性控制内停靠组件此控件的边框。This property controls the border inside of this control for docked components. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 该示例停靠面板控件中的按钮，并循环浏览属性，设置每个单独上按钮的单击操作。The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the properties, setting each individually on the click of the button. 该示例需要创建的实例控件和窗体上，并且具有声明一个名为的类级别成员变量`myCounter`作为 32 位有符号整数。The example requires that you have created an instance of a control and a on a form, and you have declared a class level member variable named `myCounter` as a 32-bit signed integer. 应在调用此代码该按钮的事件。You should call this code on the event of the button. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述的标志控件使用。The following table describes the flags the control uses. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||用于检索掩码是否属性设置为`true`。A mask used to retrieve whether the property is set to `true`.| ||用于检索掩码是否属性设置为`true`。A mask used to retrieve whether the property is set to `true`.| ||用于检索掩码是否属性设置为`true`。A mask used to retrieve whether the property is set to `true`.| ||用来检索用户所做的掩码滚动。A mask used to retrieve whether the user has made the scroll.| ||用于检索是否用户已启用全窗口拖放操作的掩码。A mask used to retrieve whether the user has enabled the full window drag-and-drop operation.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含有关滚动条和其操作的信息，如它是否已启用并可见、 滚动页面大小、 方向，显示位置，依次类推。The class contains information about the scroll bar and its operation, such as whether it is enabled and visible, the scroll page size, orientation, display position, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能属性还可以通过对调用和方法使用作为参数。The functionality of the property can also be accomplished through calls to the and methods using as the parameter. **请注意**会自动维护滚动条的可见性。**Note** maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically. 因此，设置或属性设置为`true`没有时生效已启用。Therefore, setting the or properties to `true` have no effect when is enabled.

Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseWheel (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 垂直滚动条是否可见，这意味着，属性设置为`true`，通过滚动鼠标滚轮垂直控制。If the vertical scroll bar is visible, which means that the property is set to `true`, the mouse wheel scrolls through the control vertically. 但是，如果只有水平滚动条可见，这意味着，设置为`false`和属性将设置为`true,`水平滚动鼠标滚轮。However, if only the horizontal scroll bar is visible, which means that the is set to `false` and the property to set to `true,` the mouse wheel scrolls horizontally. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Scroll As ScrollEventHandler

summary.span: 用户或代码滚动工作区时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user or code scrolls through the client area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在用户滚动工作区的滚动条中，与之进行交互时或当用户导航控件之间并滚动到视图中的活动控件。The event occurs when the user scrolls through the client area by interacting with the scroll bars, or when the user navigates between controls and the active control scrolls into view. 编写代码，例如设置时，也会发生事件属性的滚动工作区。The event also occurs when you write code, such as setting the property, that scrolls through the client area. 你可以使用中事件处理程序来确定的滚动条方向属性事件。You can use the property in your event handler to determine the scroll bar orientation for the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`ScrollableControl1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `ScrollableControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#74](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#74)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#74](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#74)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ScrollControlIntoView(class System.Windows.Forms.Control activeControl) cil managed

param.name: activeControl
param.span: 要滚动到视图中的子控件。

span.span: The child control to scroll into view.

summary.span: 将指定的子控件滚动到支持自动滚动的控件的视图中。

span.span: Scrolls the specified child control into view on an auto-scroll enabled control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为`true`，并且至少一个滚动条、 水平或垂直，也必须是可见的方法产生任何影响。The property must be set to `true`, and at least one of the scroll bars, horizontal or vertical, must also be visible, for the method to have an effect. 若要使水平和垂直滚动条可见，和属性，分别，必须设置为`true`。To make the horizontal and vertical scroll bars visible, the and properties, respectively, must be set to `true`. 如果`activeControl`参数不是子控件，不执行任何操作。If the `activeControl` parameter is not a child control, no action takes place. 此方法可能引发事件。This method may raise the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启用窗体的自动滚动，调整窗体，并确保按钮在窗体调整后仍然保持可见。The following code example enables auto-scrolling for a form, resizes the form, and ensures that a button remains visible after the form is resized. 示例要求你拥有与名为`button2`在其上。The example requires that you have a with a named `button2` on it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#2)]

summary.span: 确定 属性的值。

span.span: Determines the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段是一个掩码。The field is a mask. 你可以将它与和方法获取和设置属性。You can use it with the and methods to get and set the property.

summary.span: 确定用户是否启用了全窗口拖动。

span.span: Determines whether the user has enabled full window drag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段是一个掩码。The field is a mask. 将它与和方法获取和设置是否在用户已启用全窗口拖动。Use it with the and methods to get and set whether the user has enabled full window drag. 启用全窗口拖动后，当用户移动并调整 windows 时显示窗口的内容。When full window drag is enabled, the contents of windows are displayed when the user moves and sizes the windows.

summary.span: 确定 属性的值是否设置为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段是一个掩码。The field is a mask. 将它与和方法获取和设置属性。Use it with the and methods to get and set the property.

summary.span: 确定用户是否滚动了 控件。

span.span: Determines whether the user had scrolled through the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段是一个掩码。The field is a mask. 将它与方法以获取用户滚动是否。Use it with the method to get whether the user had scrolled through the .

summary.span: 确定 属性的值是否设置为 。

span.span: Determines whether the value of the property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段是一个掩码。The field is a mask. 将它与和方法获取和设置属性。Use it with the and methods to get and set the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Point ScrollToControl(class System.Windows.Forms.Control activeControl) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function ScrollToControl (activeControl As Control) As Point

param.name: activeControl
param.span: 要滚动到视图中的子控件。

span.span: The child control to scroll into view.

summary.span: 计算到指定子控件的滚动偏移量。

span.span: Calculates the scroll offset to the specified child control.

returns.span: 显示区域的左上 （相对于将控件滚动到视图所需的工作区）。

span.span: The upper-left hand of the display area relative to the client area required to scroll the control into view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用方法来计算距离必须滚动以显示指定的控件。The method uses the method to calculate how far it must scroll to display the specified control. 子控件的属性用于调整的滚动的位置。The property of the child control is used to adjust the scrolled position. 不会导致滚动，则为方法通常用于随后滚动到计算出的位置。 does not cause scrolling; the method is typically used to subsequently scroll to the calculated position.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAutoScrollMargin (int x, int y);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAutoScrollMargin(int32 x, int32 y) cil managed
Public Sub SetAutoScrollMargin (x As Integer, y As Integer)
public: void SetAutoScrollMargin(int x, int y);

span.span: The value.
The value.

summary.span: 设置自动滚动边距的大小。

span.span: Sets the size of the auto-scroll margins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 边距设置的宽度和每个控件的边框的高度。The margin sets the width and height of the border around each control. 此边距用于确定容器上何时需要滚动条和控件被选定时所滚动到的位置。This margin is used to determine when scroll bars are needed on the container and where to scroll to when a control is selected. > [!NOTE] > 如果作为传递负数`x`或`y`值，则该值将重置为 0。If a negative number is passed in as the `x` or `y` values, the value will be reset to 0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 该示例计算结果的文本框中的位置，并更改的外观和行为的其父容器，panel 控件。The example evaluates the location of a text box and changes the appearance and behavior of its parent container, the panel control. 该示例需要创建的实例控件， ，和。The example requires that you have created an instance of a control, , and . 框置于面板上，以便它与至少一个面板的边缘重叠。Place the box on the panel so that it overlaps at least one of the panel's edges. 此子过程单击调用上的按钮可以查看的面板的行为和外观的差异。Call this subprocedure on the click of a button to see the difference in the panel's behavior and appearance. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取与垂直滚动条相关联的特性。

span.span: Gets the characteristics associated with the vertical scroll bar.
A that contains information about the vertical scroll bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含有关滚动条和其操作的信息，如它是否已启用并可见、 滚动页面大小、 方向，显示位置，依次类推。The class contains information about the scroll bar and its operation, such as whether it is enabled and visible, the scroll page size, orientation, display position, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能属性还可以通过对调用和方法使用作为参数。The functionality of the property can also be accomplished through calls to the and methods using as the parameter. **请注意**会自动维护滚动条的可见性。**Note** maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically. 因此，设置或属性设置为`true`没有时生效已启用。Therefore, setting the or properties to `true` have no effect when is enabled.
